installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Installing steamcmd.."
echo "deb http://mirrors.linode.com/debian stretch main non-free" >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo "deb-src http://mirrors.linode.com/debian stretch main non-free" >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo steamcmd steam/question select "I AGREE" | debconf-set-selections
echo steamcmd steam/license note '' | debconf-set-selections
sleep 1

dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt-get update
apt-get install lib32gcc1 wget curl tar whiptail steamcmd -y
sleep 1

cd /mnt/server


/usr/games/steamcmd +login anonymous +app_update 996560 +quit &&
mv ~/.steam/steamapps/common/SCP* /mnt/server/scp_server &&
echo "Downloading EXILED.."
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.config
wget https://github.com/galaxy119/EXILED/releases/download/2.2.5/Exiled.Installer-Linux
ls
chmod +x Exiled.Installer-Linux
echo "Installing EXILED.."
./Exiled.Installer-Linux --path /mnt/server/scp_server --pre-releases --exit
echo "Installing Discord Integration bot.."
wget https://exiled.host/utilities/DiscordIntegration.tar.gz
mkdir DiscordIntegration
tar xzvf DiscordIntegration.tar.gz -C DiscordIntegration

cd scp_server
echo "Installation complete!"
